title: Team looking for talented Jungler
body:
Hi Everyone!
We are a newly established team and we're looking for a talented jungler for backup, and scrim work. We require you to live in Perth, and be available most nights from 7PM. It would be fantastic if you can also play a very good top lane as our top laner cannot play on Tuesday nights.

Please message me in game, or via the forums.

Thanks!!
